name: Afterconflict Lost War
description:
Afterconflict Lost War is a Multiplayer Tactical FPS where players take the role of cold war era military factions fighting over resources and land after another world-scale war breaks out. The game focuses on providing a realistic and immersive experience of war.

Key Features

  • Teamwork

    You will have to work together with your allies in order to achieve victory.

  • Factions

    Both the Warsaw Pact and NATO Forces have their own factions which will give you a wide array of equipment to choose from and customize, allowing you to decide what load-out is optimal for you to do your best.

  • Equipment

    Weapons, attachments, armor, ammo types, and other varying tools are available for you to take with them into combat.

  • Wear & Tear

    Equipment will show signs of use after being brought into enough battles, you will have the option to restore your weapon if you don't desire this look.

  • Firearm operation

    Realistic firearm operation, ballistics, ammo material penetration and damage model.

  • Locations

    Realistic locations which are kept large and diverse to create more options for teams when making their plan of action.
